tooltips.items.coin_fragment: §7Item used to craft small coin and coin templates.
tooltips.items.small_coin: §7Coin template used to craft small coins like 50 Groszy.
tooltips.items.coin: §7Coin template used to craft coins like 1 Złoty, 2 Złote & 5 Złotych.
tooltips.items.banknote: §7Banknote template used to craft banknotes like 10 Złotych, 20 Złotych, 50 Złotych & 100 Złotych
